</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell (add 1 action)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Performers popularized these bundles of aromatic herbs to calm the mind and ward off misfortune before a big show, though soldier bards have found them especially useful for clearing fear during particularly tumultuous battles. Adding this catalyst to a [_soothe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) spell also causes the spell to reduce the target's [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition value by 1.

</column>
